import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import GetAllProducts from '../../api/products' import "../../styles/Home.css" export const PostsList = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(GetAllProducts()) }, [dispatch]) const posts = useSelector(state => state.posts.posts) const renderedPosts = posts.map(post => (

{post.name}

{post.price}

Post√©e par {post.user}

{post.adress}, {post.ville}



En voir plusLikes



)) return (

Posts

{renderedPosts}
) }
